scripts.start: npm run plastiq-compile && npm run elm-compile && node ./app.js
scripts.plastiq-compile: browserify ./plastiq/browser.jsx --debug -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] | exorcist ./plastiq/bundle.max.js.map > ./plastiq/bundle.max.js && uglifyjs ./plastiq/bundle.max.js --in-source-map ./plastiq/bundle.max.js.map --source-map ./plastiq/bundle.js.map --source-map-url bundle.js.map -o ./plastiq/bundle.js
